description: Updates an existing registry which is used to hold a collection of schemas. The updated properties relate to the registry, and do not modify any of the schemas within the registry.

parameters.name: RegistryId
parameters.description: This is a wrapper structure that may contain the registry name and Amazon Resource Name (ARN). RegistryName (string) --- Name of the registry. Used only for lookup. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided. RegistryArn (string) --- Arn of the registry to be updated. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_params.name: RegistryName
nested_params.description: Name of the registry. Used only for lookup. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_params.name: RegistryArn
nested_params.description: Arn of the registry to be updated. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of the registry. If description is not provided, this field will not be updated.

nested_items.name: RegistryName
nested_items.description: The name of the updated registry.

nested_items.name: RegistryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource name (ARN) of the updated registry.
